tool.name: utils.compute_group_overlap_score
tool.description: How well do the pred_labels explain the ref_labels?
tool.help:
How well do the pred_labels explain the ref_labels?
A predicted cluster explains a reference cluster if it is contained within the reference cluster with at least 50% (threshold_overlap_pred) of its points and these correspond to at least 50% (threshold_overlap_ref) of the reference cluster.
